addons.name: 网页截图
addons.description: 帮您方便的截取网页并保存为图片。
addons.fullDescription: 帮您方便的截取网页并保存为图片。

addons.name: Enhancer for YouTube™
addons.description: 海量自定义功能提升您的 YouTube™ 用户体验。
addons.fullDescription:
一个十分易用且高度可定制的扩展程序，它允许您：

✔ 使用鼠标滚轮控制音量和播放速度

✔ 视频去广告（自动或手动）

✔ 频道白名单（不自动去广告）

✔ 屏蔽注解（自动或手动）

✔ 自动切换视频清晰度（可以设定为 4K、HD 或任意清晰度）

✔ 循环播放视频（完整循环或部分循环）

✔ 使用自定义主题样式

✔ 自动拉伸播放器

✔ 查看评论时将播放器固定在右下角

✔ 执行自定义脚本

✔ 以及更多……

Enhancer for YouTube™ 尊重您的隐私：https://www.mrfdev.com/privacy

YouTube 是 Google Inc. 的商标。 使用这个商标需要遵守 Google 的许可。

addons.name: Flash-HTML5 Player for YouTube™
addons.description: Play YouTube™ Videos in Flash or HTML5 Player
addons.fullDescription:
YouTube™ Flash-HTML allows you to play YouTube Videos in Flash or HTML5 player.

Important Features:
1. Allows you to play YouTube in Flash or HTML5 player.
2. Easily switch the player type from toolbar popup.
3. Flash player consumes less resources (i.e. CPU and RAM) and offers more resolution choices comparing to HTML5 Player.
4. HTML5 player is useful when Adobe Flash is disabled by your company or school. Note: to enable HTML5 player you need to activate HTML5 from: https://www.youtube.com/html5

Note 1: To enable HTML5 player you need to activate HTML5 from: https://www.youtube.com/html5

Note 2: In order to report Bugs, please visit Addon's Homepage and fill the Bug report form.

addons.name: YouTube Flash Player
addons.description: A very lightweight add-on that allows you to watch YouTube™ videos using Flash® Player instead of the default HTML5 player. The Flash® Player will consume less CPU and RAM resources if your device doesn't easily support HTML5 videos. Try it!
addons.fullDescription:
Why you should try this add-on? Because for a lot of people the HTML5 player is laggy and consumes much more material resources (CPU, RAM) than Flash® Player. Once installed you have nothing to do and you can easily switch between both players to compare them and choose the one that works best on your device. If hundreds of thousands people are using it it's because it works for them! Give it a try!

Want to report issues or ask questions? Don't use the reviews system below!
First, check if your Flash® plugin is up to date (https://www.mozilla.org/plugincheck). If the Flash® plugin is not installed you can get it from https://get.adobe.com/flashplayer/ (uncheck the Optional offers if any).
If you already have the latest version of the plugin, check if a more recent version of the add-on is available.
Still have problems? Contact me or use the comment system available at the bottom of the How to use YouTube™ Flash® Player page (https://www.mrfdev.com/how-to-use-youtube-flash-player).

YouTube is a trademark of Google Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Google Permissions.
Flash Player is a trademark of Adobe Inc. Use of this trademark is subject to Adobe Permissions.

addons.name: YouTube Flash Video Player
addons.description: YouTube Flash Video Player is a powerful tool that will let you choose Flash video player as default YouTube video player.
addons.fullDescription:
YouTube™ Flash® Video Player is a powerful tool that will let you choose Flash video player as default YouTube video player.

All YouTube videos will play in Flash player automatically which have more high resolution ( HD ) options than HTML5 video player.

You can also choose HTLM5 video player as default one from add-on settings.

MultiProcess Firefox Electrolysis is supported.

YouTube™ Flash® Video Player is a helper tool for YouTube™ users. YouTube™ Flash® Video Player is not officially affiliated with YouTube™ or any YouTube™ products or Flash® or any Flash® products. YouTube™ is a registered trademark Google Inc and Flash® and Flash logo® (“the Flash logo”) are registered trademarks of Adobe Inc.

If you have any support questions, feature requests and bug reports, please do not hesitate to contact us by below support email address:

support at barisderin dot com

Best Regards,

Baris Derin

addons.name: Grammar and Spell Checker - LanguageTool
addons.description: With this extension you can check text with the free style and grammar checker LanguageTool. It finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, like mixing up there/their, a/an, or repeating a word.
addons.fullDescription:
With this extension you can check text with the free style and grammar checker LanguageTool. LanguageTool finds many errors that a simple spell checker cannot detect, like mixing up there/their, a/an, or repeating a word, and it can detect some grammar problems. It supports more than 25 languages, including English, Spanish, French, German, Polish, and Russian.

LanguageTool checks the spelling and grammar of almost any text you type on the web. It is compatible with almost all text, regardless of source, including social networks such as Twitter or LinkedIn and online e-mail services, such as Gmail. Very few sites like docs.google.com, addons.mozilla.org, and chrome.google.com currently aren't supported - please use https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/languagetool/kjcoklfhicmkbfifghaecedbohbmofkm for Google Docs instead.

With LanguageTool our aim is to give users a fully-featured grammar checker and proofreader that will enable them to have control and confidence over their content. While LanguageTool is a vital extension for non-native speakers, it’s also smart enough to recognize mistakes that native speakers commonly make and it will improve your writing overall. This grammar and spelling correction works across all variations of common language; distinguishing between U.S. and British English, for instance. LanguageTool also features a personal dictionary for exceptions or words that you might commonly use but that are not found in a conventional dictionary. LanguageTool will recognize these words in future grammar checking and proofreading.

Unlike Grammarly ("Grammerly" :-) and Ginger, LanguageTool works for many languages and offers many of the same features.


Privacy

Your privacy is important to us: By default, this extension will check your text by sending it to https://languagetool.org over a securely encrypted connection. No account is needed to use this extension. We don't store your IP address. See our privacy policy for more details.


Why does LanguageTool require permission "Access your data for all websites"?

This permission is required to read the text you type into text fields. LanguageTool will only read the text you type into multi-line fields. Single-line fields and password fields are skipped.


Bugs

Please report bugs at https://forum.languagetool.org or at github.


Premium Version

We offer a Premium version which is linked from several places in the add-on. This add-on also works without payment and registration, though.


Offline Use (recommended only if you're an advanced computer user)

To use this add-on with a local server, unzip the LanguageTool desktop version from our homepage and run this command (requires Java):

java -cp languagetool-server.jar org.languagetool.server.HTTPServer --allow-origin '*'

Then, open the add-on configuration and set http://localhost:8081/v2 as the server URL and save the configuration. Note that the default configuration of the local server might lack some features of the server running at languagetool.org - see this comparison for details.


Old Versions

Old versions are still available at https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/languagetool/versions/.

addons.name: Emoji Cheatsheet
addons.description:
A reference for the codes to generate Emojis on popular sites like GitHub or Basecamp and Unicode characters for Twitter and Facebook.
Search Emojis by name or view recently selected items. Emojis are automatically copied to the clipboard.
addons.fullDescription:
Emojis are sorted into the categories known from mobile phone keyboards.

Search Emojis by name or view recently selected items to quickly find what you're looking for. Emoji codes are automatically copied to the clipboard on selection.

This is a cross-browser extension. Links for other browsers can be found on the website. (http://johannhof.github.io/emoji-helper)

Source code is available at http://github.com/johannhof/emoji-helper

addons.name: Flash Video Player for Facebook™
addons.description: Flash Video Player for Facebook™ is a powerful tool that will let you choose Flash video player as default Facebook video player.
addons.fullDescription:
Flash® Video Player for Facebook™ is a powerful tool that will let you choose Flash video player as default Facebook™ video player.

All Facebook™ videos will play in Flash player automatically which have more high resolution ( HD ) options than HTML5 video player.

You can also choose HTLM5 video player as default one from add-on settings.

MultiProcess Firefox Electrolysis is supported.

Facebook™ Flash® Video Player is a helper tool for Facebook™ users. Facebook™ Flash® Video Player is not officially affiliated with Facebook™ or any Facebook™ products or Flash® or any Flash® products. Facebook™ is a registered trademark Facebook Inc and Flash® and Flash logo® (“the Flash logo”) are registered trademarks of Adobe Inc.
